Malte is a passionate software engineer and IT consultant for the Nordic consultancy Knowit. He spends his time writing code and is currently in charge of Knowits internal Artificial Intelligence group, The Artificial Chapter. Here, he manages summits and workshops, gives presentations and talks about artificial intelligence.
